name: GPT-5.3-Codex
description: OpenAI's most capable agentic coding model to date with advanced multi-step reasoning and coding capabilities. The model notably built itself in just 10 days.

name: Claude Opus 4.6
description: Anthropic's latest model with improved reasoning, planning, and sustained agentic task capabilities specifically designed for complex coding workflows.

name: Claude Cowork (Windows)
description: Anthropic's Claude Cowork AI agent expanded to Windows with full feature parity including file access and multi-agent capabilities.

name: Showboat and Rodney
description: Tools that enable AI agents to demo what they've built, addressing key challenges in working with coding agents.
community_quotes: Agents can demo what they've built

name: Shareful.ai
description: A Stack Overflow-style platform specifically for AI coding agents to share and discover knowledge.

name: Entire Platform
description: AI Code Transparency Platform by ex-GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke, making AI-generated code transparent and reviewable. Raised record $60M seed round at $300M valuation.

name: GitHub Copilot Agents
description: GitHub announced availability of new AI agents for Copilot Pro+ and Enterprise users, enabling multiple programming agents to run in GitHub, VS Code, and GitHub Mobile.
community_quotes: Available in GitHub Mobile and VS Code

name: Visual Studio Code Multi-Agent Development
description: VS Code announced new multi-agent development capabilities with full MCP Apps support, becoming the first major AI code editor with complete MCP integration.
community_quotes: First major AI code editor with full MCP Apps

name: OpenAI Codex App for macOS
description: OpenAI launched a new macOS desktop command center for AI coding and software development with agentic coding capabilities.
community_quotes: macOS command center for AI development

name: Apple Xcode 26.3
description: Apple released Xcode 26.3 with enhanced agentic coding capabilities and integration with AI providers like Anthropic's Claude.

name: Snowflake Cortex Code
description: An AI coding agent purpose-built for enterprise data stack that understands enterprise data context to accelerate development.

name: NanoClaw
description: ~500 lines of TypeScript core code where agents run in actual Apple containers with filesystem isolation, providing a minimal yet powerful agentic coding framework.

name: OpenCode
description: Open-source AI coding agent with native terminal-based UI, multi-session support, and compatibility with 75+ AI models.

name: Plandex
description: Terminal-based AI development tool designed for large projects that can plan and execute multi-step coding tasks.

name: Qwen3-Coder-Next
description: Alibaba's Qwen team released a coding model specifically designed for coding agents that can be run locally.
community_quotes: Run powerful AI coding agents locally

name: Recallium
description: A local, self-hosted universal AI memory system that provides persistent knowledge layer for developer tools like Copilot, Cursor, and Claude.

name: Cline
description: Open-source AI coding agent with plan/act modes, MCP integration, and terminal-first workflows trusted by 5M+ developers.

name: VS Code v1.110 Workspace Priming
description: VS Code February 2026 update with workspace priming capabilities for better AI context awareness across development sessions.

name: Deno Sandbox
description: Deno launched a secure environment specifically built for running AI-generated code with sandboxed runtime capabilities.

name: vibebin
description: A self-hosted Incus/LXC platform for persistent AI coding agent environments.

name: Kilo Code
description: AI coding tool with support for multiple AI models and IDE integration.
